wexpman.persistencelayer.db.connectionmanagers

Class Db4oTransactionManagerForEmbeddedServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.transaction.support.AbstractPlatformTransactionManager
      • wexpman.persistencelayer.db.connectionmanagers.Db4oTransactionManagerForEmbeddedServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.transaction.PlatformTransactionManager

    public class Db4oTransactionManagerForEmbeddedServer
extends org.springframework.transaction.support.AbstractPlatformTransactionManager
implements org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
    Transaction manager for Db4o Embedded Server mode Db4oTransactionManager supplied by springmodules is suited to single access in standalone applications, here I need embedded server mode. Based on springmodules Db4oTransactionManager
    Author:
    Matias Alberto Gavinowich
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
